name: UnWished
description:
You just dropped your last coin down the well, oh well, there's nothing to do but jump down after it, hopefully you can keep all your limbs attached during this endeavor.

Completed for the 1 week Brackey's  Game Jam. Was a great project to get back into game dev. Hope you enjoy :)

You can either play in the browser or download the slightly better looking .exe version for Windows.

Controls

Click, hold and drag the mouse to breath in air, release to launch your character in the opposite direction. Try not to get hit 4 times while falling to the bottom of the well.

Credits

  • Programming : https://www.instagram.com/iamdylanhenderson/
  • Sound and environment modelling:  https://www.instagram.com/synicalwolf/
  • Character 3D modelling: https://www.instagram.com/mythcore_animation/
